content:
Andrii Yusov, a representative of the Main Intelligence Directorate of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine, commented on the statements of the Freedom of Russia Legion and the Russian Volunteer Corps regarding Russian losses as a result of a raid by these units in the Belgorod and Kursk regions of the Russian Federation.

Andriy Yusov made a relevant statement on a liveTelelorphoneThe only news.

The Legion of Freedom of Russia, the RDC just announced the loss of the enemy during this period. We can confirm them. These are very serious figures. More than 600 dead, killed, liquidated occupiers. In addition, more than 800 wounded, also destroyed 20 armored vehicles, APC, BMP and 7 tanks. That is, it is a serious loss on the site, which has long been declared an enemy closed, protected, ” - said GUR.

As ArmyInform reported, earlier in the Main Directorate of IntelligenceToldabout the seriousness of the appeal of the RDK to the residents of the Kursk and Belgorod regions.
title: GUR confirmed significant enemy losses during the raid of Russian volunteers in the Russian Federation
